body_html:
So I think this issue is related to the checkpoint file containing the tmp path before the rename occurs.

Inside the checkpoint folder:

# cat output/diam/20170130-005509/export/00000060/checkpoint
model_checkpoint_path: "/usr/src/app/output/diam/20170130-005509/export/00000060-tmp/export"
all_model_checkpoint_paths: "/usr/src/app/output/diam/20170130-005509/export/00000060-tmp/export"

but that folder has been renamed:

# ls /usr/src/app/output/diam/20170130-005509/export/00000060/
checkpoint  export.data-00000-of-00001  export.index  export.meta

body:
So I think this issue is related to the checkpoint file containing the `tmp` path before the rename occurs.

Inside the `checkpoint` folder:
```
# cat output/diam/20170130-005509/export/00000060/checkpoint
model_checkpoint_path: "/usr/src/app/output/diam/20170130-005509/export/00000060-tmp/export"
all_model_checkpoint_paths: "/usr/src/app/output/diam/20170130-005509/export/00000060-tmp/export"
```

but that folder has been renamed:
```
# ls /usr/src/app/output/diam/20170130-005509/export/00000060/
checkpoint  export.data-00000-of-00001  export.index  export.meta
```
